Package msvc.exceptions

Interface ITryCatch

All Known Implementing Classes:
CatchHandler, TryBlock
public interface ITryCatch
Defines the common functions for the try and catch blocks as implemented in EHExtractor.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    BlockType
    getBlockType()
    Returns the type of the block; it can be either TRY (a try block) or CATCH (a catch block).
    int
    getState()
    Retrieves the state of the block.
    boolean
    hasValidState()
    Checks if the state of the block is valid.
    void
    nest(TryBlockMapEntry tryBlockMapEntry)
    Adds a nested TryBlockMapEntry to the block.
    void
    setState(int state)
    Sets the state of the block.

  • Method Details

    • getBlockType

      BlockType getBlockType()
      Returns the type of the block; it can be either TRY (a try block) or CATCH (a catch block).
      Returns:
      The block type (TRY or CATCH).

    • getState

      int getState()
      Retrieves the state of the block.
      Returns:
      the state of the block.

    • setState

      void setState(int state) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Sets the state of the block.
      Parameters:
      state - the state of the block.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the provided state is invalid.

    • hasValidState

      boolean hasValidState()
      Checks if the state of the block is valid.
      Returns:
      true if the state is valid, false otherwise.

    • nest

      void nest(TryBlockMapEntry tryBlockMapEntry)
      Adds a nested TryBlockMapEntry to the block.
      Parameters:
      tryBlockMapEntry - the TryBlockMapEntry to nest within this block.
